subject: Labor and Jobs
Baseball
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: Lessons learned by Bud Selig, Donald Fehr and George Steinbrenner helped their sport reach a series of union deals in 1994 that are ensuring 21 years of prosperity and growth.
snippet: Lessons learned by Bud Selig, Donald Fehr and George Steinbrenner helped their sport reach a series of union deals in 1994 that are ensuring 21 years of prosperity and growth.
